>
[Maestro's Chair](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1357)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 70</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents also have access to all assistive items from Morhen’s Mobility Apparel_

**Price** 350 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 6
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _maestro's chair_ is a [traveler's chair](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1356) with the [impulse control](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1361) upgrade and a small pipe organ installed into the frame. You can use the maestro's chair to make [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks in the same manner that you could use any mundane instrument, using both of your hands. When you make a Performance check using your chair, you gain a +1 item bonus to the check.
